A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While it has some intriguing moments\, there is way too much incompetence to consider it good. Luke's portrayal\, improper use of comedy\, blatant contradictions of the previous film and tons of plotholes. All of that makes it an unenjoyable experience. It has little excuse to be this amateur\, with the competence and foundation of the previous outing.
